System.config({
    paths: {
        'npm:': './node_modules/',
        'syncfusion:': 'npm:@syncfusion/'
        
    },
    map: {
        app: 'app',              
        ${sysConfig}
    },
    packages: {
        'app': { main: 'index', defaultExtension: 'js' }
    }
});
System.import('app');
